name: mkcg/php-query-model
description: Agnostic model to efficiently query and scroll any kind of data (SQL, Search engine, HTTP API, CSV, ...) and push them anywhere with a ETL

suggest.algolia/algoliasearch-client-php: Needed to use the algolia driver
suggest.doctrine/dbal: Needed to use the doctrine driver
suggest.predis/predis: Needed to use the redis driver
suggest.ethanhann/redisearch-php: Needed to use the redisearch driver
suggest.guzzle/guzzle: Needed to use the Guzzle HTTP adapter
suggest.mongodb/mongodb: Needed to use the Mongodb driver
